info.li: Fluorescent reporters were introduced into an ap1-1;cal1-1 background (this double produces several hundred SAMs due to conversion of floral meristems into shoot meristems) to label zones as follows:
CZ CENTRAL ZONE pCLV3::mGFP5-ER Note: CLV3 expression extends into the 4th layer
PZ PERIPHERAL ZONE pFIL::dsRED-N7 Note: FIL labels a subset of the floral organ primordia cells
200 SAMs from 24 day old ap1-1;cal1-1 plants were collected within 15 minutes and protoplasted. Fluorescence-activated cell sorting was used to collect ~150,000 marked cells for each zone
RNA was isolated and hybridized to the ATH1 chip in duplicate, the average signal of which is shown
Yadav et al. (2009) Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A. 106: 4941-4946.
